description:
Brand New Course for 2016!

Join over 1400 students who have already taken this course.

Latest review: 23rd February 2016

Very Good Udemy Online Learning Course. Thanks you very much!

--

What are the requirements?

Some familiarity with Social Media is an advantage and a 'take action' mentality is essential.

Who is the target audience?

Business owners. Do you want to promote your business while helping others? Are you tired of trying to compete on Social Media? Does it seem that your competitors are already on every platform? This course is perfect for you if you want to use a platform where there is less competition and where you can make an immediate impact!

What will I get from the course?

This course is a step by step guide to Quora, the questions and answers platform founded in 2009. It is not a mainstream platform which means that your competitors are less likely to be using it!

Right now you have a wonderful opportunity to achieve the following:

* Build Your Profile and That of Your Business

* Demonstrate Your Authority

* Connect with Potential Customers and Business Partners

* Drive Traffic from Quora to Your Website

* Boost Sales of Your Information Products

In this course, I will show you what you need to do, how you should do it and how much time it will take. It is probably less time than you think. I have used Quora since 2013.

The course is made up of over 1.5 hours of course material broken down into 35 lectures.

Sound good? Okay. Let's get started!
title: Quora For Business
